mapper.select: select user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_phone, user_email, user_gender, user_birth, user_nickname, user_name, user_photo, login_type from user_tbl where user_id=#{userId}
select user_no from user_tbl where user_id=#{userId} and user_email=#{userEmail}
mapper.update: update user_tbl set user_pw = #{userPw} where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select user_no, user_id, user_nickname, user_birth, user_phone, user_email, user_gender, user_photo, (select count(*)from favorite join favorite_folder using (favorite_folder_no) where user_no=user_tbl.user_no) favorite_count, (select count(*)from review where user_nickname=user_tbl.user_nickname) review_count, (select count(*)from reservation where user_id=user_tbl.user_id) reservation_count from user_tbl where user_no = #{userNo}

select favorite_no, favorite_folder_no, store_name, (select si_filepath from store_image_file where si_file_no=(select min(si_file_no) from store_image_file where store_image_file.store_no=favorite.store_no))store_image from favorite join store on(favorite.store_no=store.store_no) where favorite_folder_no=#{favoriteFolderNo}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select reserve_date,to_char(reserve_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') reserve_date_string, to_char(reserve_date, 'hh24:mi') reserve_time, reserve_status, reserve_people, store_name, (select si_filepath from store_image_file where si_file_no=(select min(si_file_no) from store_image_file where store_image_file.store_no=reservation.store_no))store_image from reservation join store on(reservation.store_no=store.store_no) where user_id=#{userId} order by 1)r )rnum_tbl where rnum between 1 and 3

select review_no, store_name, review_score, (select si_filepath from store_image_file where si_file_no=(select min(si_file_no) from store_image_file where store_image_file.store_no=review.store_no)) store_image from review join store on(review.store_no=store.store_no) where user_nickname=#{userNickname}
mapper.update: update user_tbl set user_photo=#{userPhoto} where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select user_email, user_phone, user_name from user_tbl where user_no=#{userNo}
